subject: Re: desktop-base and KDE
body:
Daniel Baumann wrote:
> these two must be manually adjusted then, because the desktop task pulls
> gnome session in, and desktop-base likes gnome more than kde, right?

ok, that didn't made any difference at all. to me, it looks like kde
ignores these alternatives completely.

if anyone wants to try it out, the image is available at:
http://live.debian.net/etch-builds/current/i386/debian-live-etch-i386-kde-desktop.iso

or build one yourself with 'make-live -d etch -p kde-desktop'.

--
